body_html: Adding @zheng-xq. As noted in #916, sharing a GPU between TensorFlow and other code is not generally supported. However, you mentioned that you modified your other code to use stream executor, which seems like it has a chance. Are you saying you got the same error after switching to stream executor, or did the error change?
body_text: Adding @zheng-xq.  As noted in #916, sharing a GPU between TensorFlow and other code is not generally supported.  However, you mentioned that you modified your other code to use stream executor, which seems like it has a chance.  Are you saying you got the same error after switching to stream executor, or did the error change?
body: Adding @zheng-xq.  As noted in https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/916, sharing a GPU between TensorFlow and other code is not generally supported.  However, you mentioned that you modified your other code to use stream executor, which seems like it has a chance.  Are you saying you got the same error after switching to stream executor, or did the error change?
